subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: Which famous fort in Rajasthan was built by Raja Man Singh I?
question_hi: राजस्थान में राजा मन सिंह I ने कैलिएगिंग राजपूर्व
explanation_en: Amer Fort, also known as Amber Fort, was built by Raja Man Singh I Tomar. However, the correct answer is Kasli Fort, which was built by Sawai Man Singh Tomar.
explanation_hi: एमबी फोट, राजने ने बनाया है, लेकिन, सवाई मन सिंह टोमार ने कासली फोट बना है।

subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: Who was the first Rana of Chittor?
explanation_en: Rana Kumbha was the first Rana of Chittorgarh. He is also known as Meera Durg Bahadur Singh.
explanation_hi: चिट्टोर गढ़र के पहले राणा कुम्भ
explanation_en: Rana Kumbha was the first Rana of Chittorgarh. He is also known as Meera Durg Bahadur Singh.
explanation_hi: चिट्टोर गढ़र के पहले राणा कुम्भ

subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: Which is the oldest palace in Udaipur?
explanation_en: Maharana Pratap Memorial is the oldest palace in Udaipur.
explanation_hi: महाराणा प्राताप मेल, उदाहरु मेल की सौंदर

subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: Who was the founder of Ranthambore Fort?
explanation_en: Karnavar was the founder of Ranthambore Fort.

subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: Who was the founder of the Rashtrabadi Empire?
explanation_en: Pratap Singh was the founder of the Rashtrabadi Empire during the 13th century.

subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: Which Rajput king was the first to rule Rajasthan?
explanation_en: Pratap Singh was the first Rajput king to rule Rajasthan.
